dc_title_s: Neighborhood and Community Relations Funding: Minneapolis, Minnesota, 2015
dc_description_s: For questions about this data please contact NCROpenData@minneapolismn.govField DesriptionsNeighborhood Action Plan Approval Date The date on which the City of Minneapolis officially approved the neighborhood s NRP Phase 1 plan. Column name ActPlanDat. NRP Phase 1 Plan $ - NRP Phase 1 funds allocated to the plan upon official approval (Note: This does not include NRP Phase 1 funds that have since been reallocated to support implementation of the neighborhood s NRP Phase 2 plan see below). Column name Phase1Plan. NRP Phase 1 Program Income $ - Income generated from the initial investment of NRP Phase 1 funds generally as a result of repayments made under housing and economic development loans. (Note: This does not include NRP Phase 1 program income that have since been reallocated to support implementation of the neighborhood s NRP Phase 2 plan see below). Column name Phase1Inco. NRP Phase 1R Plan $ - NRP Phase 1 funds that have since been reallocated to support implementation of the neighborhood s NRP Phase 2 plan. Column name Phase1R. NRP Phase 1R Program Income $ - Income generated from the initial investment of NRP Phase 1 funds that have since been reallocated to support implementation of the neighborhood s NRP Phase 2 plan generally as a result of repayments made under housing and economic development loans. Column name Phase1RInc. NRP Phase 1 Total $ as of 9-30-2014 The total of all NRP Phase 1 funds (including program income and all funds reallocated to support implementation of the neighborhood s NRP Phase 2 plan) supporting the implementation of Minneapolis neighborhood NRP plans, as of September 30, 2014. Column name Phase1Tota. Approval Date Phase 2 Plan - The date on which the City of Minneapolis officially approved the neighborhood s NRP Phase 2 plan. Column name Phase2Date. * NRP Phase 2 Plan $ - NRP Phase 2 funds allocated to the plan upon official approval (Note: This allocation includes all funds officially approved under the original NRP Phase 2 plan, including funds that have since been frozen by the Minneapolis City Council in December 2010 see below). Column name Phase2Plan. * NRP Phase 2 Frozen $ - Phase 2 plan funds that were frozen by the Minneapolis City Council in December, 2010, and not available for use by neighborhood to implement to NRP Phase 2 plans. Column name Phase2Froz. NRP Phase 2 AHRF $ - NRP Phase 2 neighborhood funds earmarked by the Minneapolis City Council for use on affordable housing projects throughout the city. Column name Phase2AHRF. NRP Phase 2 COPSIRF $ - NRP Phase 2 neighborhood funds earmarked by the Minneapolis City Council for use on community-oriented public safety initiatives throughout the city. Column name Phase2COPS. NRP Phase 2 Program Income $ - Income generated from the initial investment of NRP Phase 2 funds generally as a result of repayments made under housing and economic development loans. Column name Phase2Inco. NRP Phase 2 Total $ as of 9-30-2014 - The total of all NRP Phase 2 funds (including program income) supporting the implementation of Minneapolis neighborhood NRP plans, as of September 30, 2014. (Note: This does not include Phase 1R or Phase 1R Program Income that are used to implement the Phase 2 plan those are accounted for under NRP Phase 1 Total $ as of 9-30-2014 see above). Column name Phase2Tota. PlanNet Neighborhood Name (for sorting with other PlanNet info) This is a field used in PlanNet the City s information system used for tracking NRP and CPP neighborhood initiatives. It is included for use in conjunction with other PlanNet-derived data. Column name SYSNAME.
